## Source: ossf-package-analysis (14899e79751cae9a41794144e2d2e623825debe93440f07805671b3f7c7e7d3a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.unity.testtools.codecoverage' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
